name: Escape Room Collection C1
description:
Game Name:
Escape Room Collection C1

Game Description:
This is a collection of escape room games. In these games, you will be locked in a room where you will have to find clues and solve puzzles to escape before time runs out.
Each game offers a unique and challenging experience, with intricate puzzles and unexpected twists and turns. Can you stay calm under pressure and escape the room before time runs out? Only the smartest and most resourceful players will succeed in these thrilling escape room challenges.

Target:
1. Find clues and solve puzzles to escape the escape room.
2. Meet all the secret room challenges.
3. Unlock all the chapters

How to play:
Once you're in the game, explore the secret rooms built by the game, which you can complete by tapping. On the right side of the game, there is a list of backpacks, you can view the collected clue items, some items can be used directly, and some items may need to be combined with other items to generate new items to use normally. The use of props requires a clever combination of daily life experience, but some props may not be able to think about its use according to normal ideas. The specific puzzles in each level are different and need to be explored by the player himself.

Skill:
Some props can't be used in the usual way, and there may be other uses, and there are often clues where the graphics are clearly marked, but not always

Game Features:
Series Collection: Multiple chapters, rich levels, intricate puzzles, all kinds of impossible possibilities, mind-blowing.
Casual decompression: Immerse yourself in the levels of the game, find and explore, discover new possibilities, discover new clues and props, and guess the purpose of props after getting them, which is exciting and joyful.
Reasoning exercises: face a variety of difficult puzzles, messy clues. Actively use your brain, connect them, and solve the problems one by one. It's hearty.
